citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Official during the inspection process between 10:29am-11:04
am on 02-April-24. On arrival the inspector rang the doorbell on the house door and called out in the yard as well as
knocking on the door of one of the sheds. A message was left at the phone number on the account. A leave behind flyer
was left on the house door before leaving. The licensee called at 3:50pm to say his wife and he had been running errands
in town during the inspection time. Optimal hours were discussed and updated for the account.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Official during the inspection process between 10:29am-11:04 
am on 02-April-24. On arrival the inspector rang the doorbell on the house door and called out in the yard as well as 
knocking on the door of one of the sheds. A message was left at the phone number on the account. A leave behind flyer 
was left on the house door before leaving. The licensee called at 3:50pm to say his wife and he had been running errands 
in town during the inspection time. Optimal hours were discussed and updated for the account.  
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
